bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Ignacio Alvare, October 21, 1940

div1.p: Hench thanks Alvare for the photos, and will send copies of his papers on Lazear and Camp Lazear to both Ramos and Alvare.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Ignacio Alvare, October 21, 1940
div1.opener:
3/6/41 - Me Port
October 21, 1940
Dr. Ignacio Alvare
9 No. 304
Vedado, Habana
Cuba
My dear Doctor Alvare:
div1.p:
I cannot tell you how greatly I appreciate your
real courtesy in hunting up the old films and having six
copies made for me. They are very fine photographs and will
be more useful to me. I am preparing two papers, one on the
contribution of Dr. Lazear to give at the dedication of the
Lazear Memorial this Saturday at Washington and Jefferson
College. Naturally, this stresses the work of Lazear. My
second paper is to be on the location of Camp Lazear. I will
send this data to Dr. Domingo Ramos, and will certainly send
you a copy also, as I know you will be interested in it. At
that time, I will be glad to send you some photographs, which
I am sure will also interest you. In the meantime, may I ex-
press my deep appreciation and kindest regards.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
